v8:item.v8:content: Select an option of adding additional %1 "%2" to the "%3" set
Brief property presentation to display in value edit forms.
The attribute will store data of the specified type. For example, a date, a number, or text.
The maximum string length is 1024 characters.
Used in the title of an additional attribute value form.
Used in the title of an additional attribute choice form.
Shared attribute belongs to set: Outgoing payment — Cash account
List of values shared for attribute "Color" of set "Products (bags)"

With the name, you can address the additional attribute or information record in the code. The name must be a single word that starts with a letter and can contain digits, letters, and underscores ( _ ). Unless specified, the name is generated automatically.

Settings.QueryText: SELECT ValuesOverridable.Ref, ValuesOverridable.DataVersion, ValuesOverridable.DeletionMark, ValuesOverridable.Predefined, ValuesOverridable.Owner, ValuesOverridable.Parent, ValuesOverridable.IsFolder, ValuesOverridable.Description AS Description, ValuesOverridable.Weight FROM Catalog.ObjectsPropertiesValues AS ValuesOverridable

SELECT Sets.Ref AS Ref, Sets.DataVersion AS DataVersion, Sets.DeletionMark AS DeletionMark, Sets.Predefined AS Predefined, Sets.Parent AS Parent, Sets.IsFolder AS IsFolder, Sets.Description AS Description, Sets.Used AS Used, CASE WHEN Sets.IsFolder THEN Sets.Description WHEN &PropertyKind = VALUE(Enum.PropertiesKinds.AdditionalInfo) THEN CASE WHEN Sets.InfoCount = "" THEN Sets.Description ELSE Sets.Description + " (" + Sets.InfoCount + ")" END WHEN &PropertyKind = VALUE(Enum.PropertiesKinds.AdditionalAttributes) THEN CASE WHEN Sets.AttributesCount = "" THEN Sets.Description ELSE Sets.Description + " (" + Sets.AttributesCount + ")" END WHEN &PropertyKind = VALUE(Enum.PropertiesKinds.Labels) THEN CASE WHEN Sets.LabelCount = "" THEN Sets.Description ELSE Sets.Description + " (" + Sets.LabelCount + ")" END END AS Presentation, CASE WHEN Sets.DeletionMark THEN 1 ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN Sets.Predefined THEN 2 ELSE 0 END AS PictureNumber FROM Catalog.AdditionalAttributesAndInfoSets AS Sets WHERE CASE WHEN Sets.Parent = VALUE(Catalog.AdditionalAttributesAndInfoSets.EmptyRef) THEN Sets.Ref IN (&Sets) ELSE Sets.Parent IN (&Sets) END AND Sets.Used AND ISNULL(Sets.Parent.Used, TRUE) AND NOT Sets.Ref IN (&SetsToExclude) AND NOT Sets.DeletionMark

v8:item.v8:content: Format determines valid values when a user tries to edit the property value.
